name: Untitled Pub Game
description:
Play Dice games with your pals at the pub in this St Patty's Day themed game jam game!  Each game last two rounds where you get to roll for the highest number.

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Space bar to interact (Talk/Roll Dice)

Credits:

Patrick - Lead Programmer

Hunter - Programmer

Tea - Overworld Sprites

Donut - Character portraits
